example.name: Tasty example from google (destination, theme)
example.text: When he opened a year and a half ago, he layered the sandwiches with slices of Gilboa cheese and sprinklings of Parmesan.
example.arg: When he opened a year and a half ago
with slices of Gilboa cheese and sprinklings of Parmesan

example.name: another example from google (theme, destination)
example.text: She layered the audio of her recorded vocals over the video.
